de.malkusch.whoisServerList.publicSuffixList

Class PublicSuffixList

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.malkusch.whoisServerList.publicSuffixList.PublicSuffixList

  • @Immutable
public final class PublicSuffixList
extends Object
    API for the Public Suffix List. Use PublicSuffixListFactory for building this api. You can use the API's methods with UTF-8 domain names or Punycode encoded ASCII domain names. The API will return the results in the same format as the input was. I.e. if you use an UTF-8 string the result will be an UTF-8 String as well. Same for Punycode. The API is case insensitive.
    Author:
    markus@malkusch.de
    See Also:
    PublicSuffixListFactory, https://publicsuffix.org/, Donations

    • Method Detail

      • getRegistrableDomain

        public String getRegistrableDomain(String domain)
        Gets the registrable domain. E.g. "www.example.net" and "example.net" will return "example.net". Null, an empty string or domains with a leading dot will return null. This method is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain name, null returns null
        Returns:
        the registrable domain, null if the domain is not registrable at all

      • isRegistrable

        public boolean isRegistrable(String domain)
        Returns whether a domain is registrable. E.g. example.net is registrable, "www.example.net" and "net" are not. This method is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain name, not null
        Returns:
        true if the domain is registrable

      • getPublicSuffix

        public String getPublicSuffix(String domain)
        Returns the public suffix from a domain. If the domain is already a public suffix, it will be returned unchanged. E.g. "www.example.net" will return "net". This method is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain name
        Returns:
        the public suffix, null if none matched

      • isPublicSuffix

        public boolean isPublicSuffix(String domain)
        Returns whether a domain is a public suffix or not. Example: "com" is a public suffix, "example.com" isn't. This method is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain name, not null
        Returns:
        true if the domain is a public suffix

      • getCharset

        public Charset getCharset()
        Returns the character encoding of the public suffix list.
        Returns:
        the character encoding

      • getURL

        public URL getURL()
        Returns the URL of the public suffix list.
        Returns:
        the URL

      • getRules

        public List<Rule> getRules()
        Returns a list with all rules.
        Returns:
        the rule list
